post:
LET,

We have a new node online in the UK, I have a limited time promotion available in our Coventry, UK location only. The offer includes a 1Gbit port with 4 CPUs :) There is no limit to how many you can order, the price you see is the price you will get, it will never increase or change.

This is a Valentines Day special, and we will stop taking orders for this special shortly after Valentine's Day.

- 2048MB Guaranteed RAM
- 2560MB Burst RAM
- 70GB Disk Space
- 1000GB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- OpenVZ/SolusVM

5.99/mo forever price.
Order: https://www.ugvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=96

**Coventry Network:**

Test IPv4: 77.75.125.131
Test File: http://77.75.125.131/100mb.test

Let me know if anyone has any questions!!

Enjoy,

-Crystal
